# sc upgrade

**Description:** Upgrade SC templates and rules to latest version

## Usage

```bash
sc upgrade [action] [options]
```

## Options

| Option | Description |
|--------|-------------|
| `--auto` | Auto-accept non-conflicting changes |
| `--force` | Force upgrade even with conflicts |
| `-v, --verbose` | Verbose output |

- **File:** `./commands/upgrade/upgrade`
- **Line:** 998
